text:
Fifteen years ago, Emily Bazelon, John Dickerson, and David Plotz recorded their first podcast together, and the Political Gabfest was born.

Now, it’s time to celebrate 15 years of analysis, laughs, and, of course, cocktail chatter. Sign up now! https://t.co/ob7yqcZhbv
